greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of the Beatty sequence A003512 for 2 + sqrt(3).
link: Clark Kimberling, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = floor(n*r) - floor(n*r - r), where r = 2 + sqrt(3), n >= 1.
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Sep 24 2016
